chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
f: nat -> nat -> mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_instr (pos (S n))
g: nat -> nat -> list (mm_instr (pos n)) -> list (mm_instr (pos (S n)))
g_app: forall (k i : nat) P Q, g k i (P ++ Q) = g k i P ++ g k (length P + i) Q
g_app_inv: forall (k i : nat) P (l r : list (mm_instr (pos (S n)))), g k i P = l ++ r -> exists L R : list (mm_instr (pos n)), P = L ++ R /\ l = g k i L /\ r = g k (length l + i) R
length_g: forall (l i : nat) P, length (g l i P) = length P
g_subcode: forall (k i : nat) P (j : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)), (j, ρ :: nil) <sc (i, P) -> (j, f k j ρ :: nil) <sc (i, g k i P)
subcode_g: forall (k i : nat) P (j : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos (S n))), (j, ρ :: nil) <sc (i, g k i P) -> exists ρ' : mm_instr (pos n), (j, ρ' :: nil) <sc (i, P) /\ ρ = f k j ρ'
g_loops: forall (k i : nat) P, 1 <= i -> i + length P <= k -> mm_no_self_loops (i, g k i P)
P: list (mm_instr (pos n))
R: list (mm_instr (pos (S n)))
sc_R_1: (1 + lP, DECₐ pos0 0 :: nil) <sc (1 + lP, R)

Goal:
(2 + lP, DECₐ pos0 (1 + (2 + lP)) :: DECₐ pos0 (2 + lP) :: nil) <sc (1 + lP, R)

Premises:

Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [n : nat f := fun (k i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) => match ρ with | INCₐ x => INCₐ (pos_nxt x) | DECₐ x j => DECₐ (pos_nxt x) (if Nat.eq_dec i j then 1 + k else if le_lt_dec k j then 0 else j) end : nat -> nat ->...-> mm_no_self_loops (i, g k i P) P : list (mm_instr (pos n)) R := DECₐ pos0 0 :: DECₐ pos0 (3 + lP) :: DECₐ pos0 (2 + lP) :: nil : list (mm_instr (pos (S n))) sc_R_1 : (1 + lP, DECₐ pos0 0 :: nil) <sc (1 + lP, R) |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat f := fun (k i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) => match ρ with | INCₐ x => INCₐ (pos_nxt x) | DECₐ x j => DECₐ (pos_nxt x) (if Nat.eq_dec i j then 1 + k else if le_lt_dec k j then 0 else j) end : nat -> nat -> mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_instr (pos (S n)) g := fix g (k i : nat) P {struct P} : list (mm_instr (pos (S n))) := match P with | nil => nil | ρ :: P0 => f k i ρ :: g k (S i) P0 end : nat -> nat -> list (mm_instr (pos n)) -> list (mm_instr (pos (S n...
Fin.caseS' : forall (p : pos (S ?n)) (P0 : pos (S ?n) -> Type), P0 pos0 -> (forall p0 : pos ?n, P0 (pos_nxt p0)) ->...-> mm_no_self_loops (i, g k i P) P : list (mm_instr (pos n)) R := DECₐ pos0 0 :: DECₐ pos0 (3 + lP) :: DECₐ pos0 (2 + lP) :: nil : list (mm_instr (pos (S n))) sc_R_1 : (1 + lP, DECₐ pos0 0 :: nil) <sc (1 + lP, R) |- nat]
mm_self_loop_no_term_2 : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (s : nat * vec nat n) (v : vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x (1 + i) :: DECₐ x i :: nil) <sc (1, P) -> s = (i, v) \/ s = (1 + i, v) -> v#>x = 0 -> ~ (1, P) // s ↓
mm_steps_DEC_1_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = S u -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -[k'] -> st
mm_no_self_loops_app : forall (n i : nat) (P Q : list (mm_instr (pos n))), mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> mm_no_self_loops (length P + i, Q) -> mm_no_self_loops (i, P ++ Q)
mm_steps_INC_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, INCₐ x :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -[k'] -> st
mm_compute_DEC_S : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
mm_progress_DEC_S : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -+> st
mm_special_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), Q se -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> P // (j, w) ->> se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, P // s -> > se -> Q s
mm_steps_DEC_0_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (p, v) -[k'] -> st
mm_sss_DEC1_inv : forall (n : nat) (x : pos n) (k u i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), v#>x = S u -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = 1 + i /\ w = v[u/x]
mm_self_loop_no_term_1 : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (s : nat * vec nat n) (v : vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x i :: nil) <sc (1, P) -> s = (i, v) -> v#>x = 0 -> ~ (1, P) // s ↓
mm_term_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), (out_code (fst se) P -> Q se) -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> P // (j, w) ~~> se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, P // s ~~> se -> Q s
mm_progress_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (k, v) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -+> st

unfold sc in *. destruct sc_R_1 as [Hpos Hsc].
apply g_app_inv in Hpos as [L [R [Hapi [Hl Hr]]]].
apply g_app_inv in Hapi as [LL [RR [HapiL [HLP HR]]]].
subst. simpl. rewrite app_nil_r.
apply g_subcode in Hsc. apply subcode_g in Hsc as [ρ' [Hsc ρ'eq]].
subst. simpl. rewrite app_nil_r.
apply g_subcode in Hsc. apply subcode_g in Hsc as [ρ'' [Hsc ρ''eq]].
subst. simpl. rewrite app_nil_r.
unfold sc. simpl. split; auto.
